string-array.name: help_items_announcements
string-array.item: Tap the top left of the screen or swipe from the left to open the menu for the application
All announcements are present on this page and are sorted from most to least recent

string-array.name: help_items_assignments
string-array.item: Open the navigation drawer to add new assignments
Tap on an assignment to view in more detail

string-array.name: help_items_add_assignment
string-array.item: Tap a day to create a new assignment due on that date
Slide up or down to go from one month to another
